thread.title: Charlie Crist expected to announce Congress run
thread.title_full: Charlie Crist expected to announce Congress run

author: Associated Press
title: Charlie Crist expected to announce Congress run
text:
Former Gov. Charlie Crist expected to announce run for Congress Associated Press 6:59 AM, Oct 20, 2015 Charlie Crist gestures to the crowd as he walks on stage followed by his running mate, Annette Taddeo, Tuesday, Nov. 4, 2014, in St. Petersburg. Crist lost by a very slim margin to Gov. Rick Scott. CHRIS URSO/Tampa Tribune Previous Next 
ST. PETERSBURG, Fla. (AP) â€” Former Republican Gov. Charlie Crist is expected to announce he's running for Congress as a Democrat in an attempt to return to politics. 
Crist has a series of news conference scheduled at 10:30 a.m. Tuesday in his hometown of St. Petersburg. 
Crist served as governor from 2007 until 2011 but decided to run for Senate in 2010 instead of seeking a second term. He dropped out of the Republican primary and ran as an independent after falling behind to eventual winner Marco Rubio. 
Crist later registered as a Democrat and challenged Republican Gov. Rick Scott last year, losing in a close election after Scott pumped almost $13 million of his own money into his campaign in the final week. Crist hopes to replace Republican U.S. Rep. David Jolly, who is running for Senate.
